sentences.en: A photographer recorded the scene on video for posterity.
sentences.cn: 摄影师用摄像机为后代记录下了这个场景。

sentences.en: He left behind an immortal example to all posterity.
sentences.cn: 他给后世留下了不朽的典范.

sentences.en: His work must be preserved for posterity.
In the desert, he might have addressed himself more entirely to his true audience, posterity.
sentences.cn: 在沙漠里, 他倒更能够推心置腹地对真正的听众 -- 后世子孙--讲话.

sentences.en: It'should be said that , upon Poe, the verdict of posterity has not been unanimous.
sentences.cn: 应该说, 后人对坡的评价不一.

sentences.en: Posterity , of course, has endorsed Hawthorne's judgement.
sentences.cn: 后世的人们当然是赞同霍桑的评价的.

sentences.en: Posterity seemed to follow his steps as a train of clients.
sentences.cn: 子孙后代似乎象一排门客,跟随在他的身后.

sentences.en: The names of those who died are recorded for posterity on a tablet at the back of the church.
sentences.cn: 死者姓名都刻在教堂后面的一块石匾上以便后人铭记.
后代把这个案子翻了过来.

sentences.en: Their music has been preserved for posterity .
sentences.cn: 他们的音乐已为后世保存起来。

sentences.en: This fine building should be preserved for posterity.
sentences.cn: 这一优美的建筑应该保护好留给子孙后代.

sentences.en: Was he making these notes for the benefit of posterity?
sentences.cn: 他写下这些笔记是为让后人受益吗？

sentences.en: We must secure the benefits of freedom for ourselves and our posterity.
sentences.cn: 我们必须为我们和我们的后代保证自由的权益.

sentences.en: You must stop imagining that posterity will vindicate you.
sentences.cn: 你可别以为后代会给你昭雪沉冤.

trans.tran_cn: 后代，后世，子孙，后裔，儿孙
trans.tran_en: all the people in the future who will be alive after you are dead
